SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.lightModel.lightPlayerRelated

Class LightCodex

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.lightModel.lightPlayerRelated.LightCodex
All Implemented Interfaces:
Differentiable, Observed, Serializable
public class LightCodex extends Object implements Differentiable, Observed
This class represents the codex in the light model. It contains the points, the collectables, the frontier and the placement history of the player who owns it.
See Also:

    • addPlacement

      public void addPlacement(List<LightPlacement> placementDiff)
      For each LightPlacement in placementDiff, add it to the placement history At the end of the update, notify the observers
      Parameters:
      placementDiff - the placements to be added to the placement history

    • setCollectables

      public void setCollectables(Map<Collectable,Integer> collectables)

      collectables - the map containing the updated value for the collectables
